name: Stuck In Paris
description:
You are trapped in the middle of the Place Charles de Gaulle in Paris! Honk like a real parisian!

Try to exit this roundabout from hell without crashing into the other cars and climb the ladder to the first place and see how many levels you can clear.

Fun mode in the main menu turns on or off the NPC explosions: **more explosions -> more fun**

Keyboard Controls

- Arrow keys / WASD : Move your car.
- Space bar / H : Honk and ask the cars next to you to change lane.

Controller Controls
Menu navigation is still with the mouse.

- Left Stick : Steer your car
- Right Trigger : Accelerate
- Left Trigger : Break
- A Button : Honk
